definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: Chapter One is the basic connotation of social security law system.
sentences.chinese: 第一章为社会保障法律制度的基本涵义。

sentences.english: Wang Baoming was appointed Director of the Labor and Social Security Office of Zhengzhou.
sentences.chinese: 任命王保明为郑州市劳动和社会保障局局长。

sentences.english: The title of Chapter IV shall be amended as "Rights and Interests of Labor and Social Security".
sentences.chinese: 第四章章名修改为“劳动和社会保障权益”。

sentences.english: Better social safety-nets might encourage Asians to save less.
sentences.chinese: 而完善的社会保障系统也许会鼓励人们减少储蓄。

sentences.english: Sixth, the pace of supporting reforms will be speeded up, with focus on the establishment of a social security system.
sentences.chinese: 加快配套改革步伐，特别是社会保障制度的建立。

sentences.english: Sound social security system, to expand social security coverage.
sentences.chinese: 健全社会保障制度，扩大社保覆盖面。

sentences.english: Please go to the Labour and Social Security Bureau in provincial capital. (The province is you want to work in).
sentences.chinese: 在省劳动厅和社会保障处办理。

sentences.english: Medicare I think is one of the cornerstones of our social safety net.
sentences.chinese: 我认为医疗保险是社会保障网的一块基石。

sentences.english: We will collect and build social security funds through a variety of channels.
sentences.chinese: 多渠道筹集和积累社会保障基金。

sentences.english: We will move faster to improve the social security system for both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快完善覆盖城乡居民的社会保障体系。

sentences.english: Crouse is 72 and receives Social Security but said that was not enough to live on.
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯先生72岁，享受社会保障，但他说不够生活。

sentences.english: The last one, it perfect social ensurance system and build up a protective screen of the economic development.
sentences.chinese: 第五是健全社会保障体系，构筑经济发展的安全屏障。

sentences.english: Today you think of social security or some other system.
sentences.chinese: 今天，你想到社会保障系统或其它别的社会系统。

sentences.english: Sixth, we should promote supportive reforms focusing on the establishment of a social security system.
sentences.chinese: 第六，推进以建立社会保障制度为重点的配套改革。

sentences.english: It is required that the government interposes rural medical security system.
sentences.chinese: 农村医疗保障是农村社会保障体系的重要组成部分。

definition: social insurance/abbr. for 社會保險|社会保险
medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
